creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: sketchlike scene of scattered people walking along a sidewalk; shaded trees at L; old buildings in background; fence LRQ
inscription:
Signature, Stamp

in graphite on verso: APG 8034
markings: blue stamp on verso, LR: KG, for Kenneth Guichard, not in Lugt
provenance: Kenneth Guichard (not in Lugt). [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold May 13, 1986, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in graphite on tab, lower edge: [Theodore Roussel Imp]; signed in plate at upper right: [Theodore / Roussel]
title: Bank Holiday, Corner of Beaufort Street, Chelsea
